text: Many men with only limited accommodation have to do their woodwork on the kitchen table: Providing this is sound; some perfectly work can be done on it, but the usual problems are those of the vice; the bench and storage place for tools. The combined bench and tool cupboard shown here has been specially designed and made for WOODWORKER readers who have this difficulty: Men with only limited accommodation have to do their woodwork on the kitchen table. Some work can be done on it, but the usual problems are those of the vice, the bench and storage place for tools. The combined bench and tool cupboard shown here has been specially designed and made for WOODWORKER readers who have this difficulty.
